title: Baroness Altmann: Our plans for the future of British retirement
text: Special Reports Baroness Altmann: Our plans for the future of British retirement Pensions minister Baroness Altmann explains the biggest changes to the state pension in a century and justifies a raft of other measures In the first 10 years after implementation, around 650,000 women are expected to receive on average Â£8 a week more state pension Photo: Ian Jones By Baroness Altmann
